pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Tool for Selecting Genes Related to Survival Outcomes using Longitudinal Gene Expression Data // Longitudinal genomics data and survival outcome are common in biomedical studies. It is of great interest to select genes related to the survival outcome. LCox is a computationally efficient tool for selecting genes related to the survival outcome using the longitudinal genomics data. LCox is powerful to detect different forms of dependence between the longitudinal biomarkers and the survival outcome.
